channel.title: bookstack on Andrea Cirillo
channel.description: Recent content in bookstack on Andrea Cirillo

item.title: Deep Work - rules for focused success in adistracted world
item.description: a really brief summary what I have succesfully applied from this book has it worked? a really brief summary There are two diverging trends in our society: by one hand in our society tend to succeed those whose can be considered high-skilled like real professionals in data science realm on the other hand the same society force ourself to an increasingly fragmented style of life, full of shallow stimolous and activites, like reading Facebook notifications or immediately reply to emails That is why the good author of the book calls for a regaining of the ability to perform Deep Work i.

item.title: The Visual Display of Quantitative Information
item.description: I am currently reading this elegant book which definitely represents a milestone in the field of data visualisation. So far, besides the iluminating principles and observation spreaded troughout the book, the feature I am appreciating the most is the ability to communicate how relevant data visualisation can be if practiced effectively, seriously and with integrity. That saidâ€¦ I am still reading the book, so stay tuned for a better summary to come!
